frontmatter.title: Sleep Sounds Player
frontmatter.subtitle: A client application that provides users with a virtual sound mixer and bank of relaxing sounds.

frontmatter.title: GIS Data Visualizer
frontmatter.subtitle: A front-end web application providing non-technical users with access to advanced Google Maps data visualization features.

frontmatter.title: Ephemeral Chat App
frontmatter.subtitle: A full stack web application capable of connecting an arbitrary number of users through a real time chat room.
